info: Your booking is confirmed for the following times
resultWithReservations: Your booking is confirmed for the following times.
resultWithoutReservations: Unfortunately, your booking requests could not be confirmed.
errorGeneratingPDF: Failed to create the PDF document
saveNewTimeSuccess: Time of the booking has been changed

cancel.ingress: You are about to cancel your booking.
cancel.ingressApplication: You are about to cancel a booking that is part of a seasonal booking.
cancel.infoBody: We want to make the Varaamo service even better. We would love to hear why you are cancelling your booking.
cancel.infoBodyApplication: We want to make the Varaamo service even better. We would love to hear why you are cancelling your seasonal booking.

reasons.FOUND_ANOTHER_SPACE_ELSEWHERE: I found another space somewhere else
reasons.FOUND_ANOTHER_SPACE_VARAAMO: I found another space through Varaamo
reasons.UNSUITABLE_SPACE: The space is not suitable for my purpose
reasons.PROCESSING_TIME_TOO_LONG: The booking processing time is too long
reasons.NOT_PAID: The booking was not paid for or invoice was not selected as the payment method by the deadline

cancelSection.title: Cancel all bookings
cancelSection.ingress: You are about to cancel the entire seasonal booking, including all associated bookings.
cancelSection.body: We want to make the Varaamo service even better. We would love to hear why you are cancelling your seasonal booking.

modal.title: Are you sure you want to cancel all bookings?
modal.body: If you select "Cancel bookings", all your bookings will be deleted and cannot be restored. You can return to the previous view by selecting "Previous".

makeNewReservation: Please make a new booking for the same item.

paymentBanner.title: Your booking is waiting for payment
paymentBanner.description: Your booking is confirmed. Pay online or select invoice as the payment method before the deadline, otherwise the booking will be automatically cancelled.

expired.title: Your booking has been cancelled
expired.description: The booking has been cancelled because it was not paid or an invoice was not selected as the payment method before the deadline.

modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_MODIFICATION_NOT_ALLOWED: Unfortunately, the booking could not be changed.
modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_MODIFICATION_NOT_ALLOWED_SUF: If necessary, you can cancel it and make a new booking.
modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_BEGIN_IN_PAST: The booking can no longer be cancelled or changed because the booking time has passed.
modifyTimeReasons.CANCELLATION_NOT_ALLOWED: The booking is binding and cannot be cancelled.
modifyTimeReasons.CANCELLATION_TIME_PAST: Unfortunately, the booking could not be cancelled or changed, because the cancellation time has passed.
modifyTimeReasons.RESERVATION_TIME_INVALID: The booking period is too short

cancellationReasons.termsAreBinding: The booking is binding and cannot be cancelled.
cancellationReasons.buffer: Unfortunately, the booking could not be cancelled or changed, because the cancellation time has passed.

reservationExpiredDescription: Your booking expired before the payment was processed. Please, repeat the booking process.

confirmationError.heading: Awaiting for payment
confirmationError.body: Your payment could not be confirmed. Please check the status of your booking in a moment from Your bookings -page. If the booking was unsuccessful, please repeat the booking process. Our customer service will provide assistance if necessary.

confirmNavigation: If you wish to leave this page, your booking will be cancelled automatically.
accessTypeChanged: Changes in access to the space. See instructions.
reservationNoLongerPayable: The booking can no longer be paid

requires_handling.title: Your booking is being processed
requires_handling.body: You will receive a booking confirmation by email shortly.

confirmed.title: Your booking is confirmed
confirmed.body: You will receive a booking confirmation by email shortly.

polling_timeout.title: The status of the payment related to the booking could not be verified.
polling_timeout.body: Please recheck the status of the booking at this page after 10 minutes. If the status still has not changed by then, please contact the customer service.
